name: Wand of Fortune R
storyline: Lulu is a student of a magic school, but is actually a trouble student. Because of her poor magic skills and continual troubles, she was forced to transfer to a different school. She happily joined the new school, but soon discovered a shocking fact... She doesn't have an attribute as a magical girl! If she can't find her attribute before she graduates, her magic power will need to be sealed... Well, will she be able to find it...?
summary:
A bundle of Wand of Fortune and it's fandisc. Features a completely renewed play system, 42 new CGs and the option for the boys to call Lulu's name if it's left as default. Lulu is also now partially voiced.
For iOS and Android, it is included in the "Story Jar" app.
